315382.「<cs_pchero> ご苦労だった。\n おまえの呼びかけに 応じて\n 皆:
<cs_pchero> Thanks for your efforts. They
all came in response to your call.

315383.「師匠 ただいま戻りました！\n ルーインさんが泊まっている宿が わかったので\:
Master, I'm back! I found out where Ruine is
staying, so I went to visit him.

315384.「でも 部屋から 出てきてはくれませんでした。\n 扉越しに 虚竜王の件を伝えて:
But he didn't come out of his room. I tried to
tell them about the false Dragonlord through
the door...but it seems he didn't come...

315385.「あっ……でも 僕と <cs_pchero>さんで\n ルーインさんの分まで が:
Ah...but I and <cs_pchero> will do our best
to make up for Ruine-san! Right?
<cs_pchero>!

315386.「ふたりとも ありがとう。助かるよ。: Thank you both. You're a big help.

315387.「……皆 よく集まってくれた。\n 聞きおよんでいるとおり 虚竜王グリーデルが\:
...thank you all for being here. As you have
heard, Griedel, the Dragon King of the Void,
has finally returned.

315388.「虚竜王は はるか昔に 竜のチカラを奪った\n 私の仲間たちの なれの果て……\:
The false Dragonlord is the end result of my
companions who long ago stole the power of the
dragon...you are not responsible for anything.

315389.「だが オーグリードを救うため\n どうか 皆のチカラを 貸してほしい。:
But in order to save Ogreed, please lend me
your help.

315390.「虚竜王は チカラを求めてやまない……。\n 放っておけば ありとあらゆるものを:
The false Dragonlord is always looking for power. If left unchecked, it will take in everything and everything in its path and kill
it.

315391.「だが 勝機はある。\n ……そう バウギスだ。: But there is a winner. ...yes, Baugis.

315392.「バウギスのチカラから 生まれた虚竜王は\n 何よりも バウギスのチカラを 欲し:
The Dragonlord, born of the power of Baugis,
wants the power of Baugis more than anything
else.

315393.「そこで 私がバウギスに乗り\n 竜のすみかに ヤツを おびき寄せて\n 討ち果:
So, I will ride Baugis to Dragon's Den, lure
him there, and take him out.

315394.「だが……厄介なことに 虚竜王が復活した\n 今もなお 虚竜が出現し続けている。:
But... troublingly, even now that the False
Dragonlord has been resurrected, the False
Dragon continues to emerge.

315395.「虚竜王は ヤツらを引き連れて 現れるだろう。\n 皆は 虚竜たちを 殲滅してく:
The False Dragonlord will appear with them in
tow. You must exterminate the false dragons.

315397.「<cs_pchero>。竜術士として 特に\n 目覚ましい成長を見せてくれた:
You have shown especially remarkable growth as a Dragomancer, and I want you to work with me to defeat the False
Dragonlord.

315399.「虚竜王グリーデル……！\n ついに 現れたな。:
Griedel, Dragon King of the Void..! It has
finally appeared.

315400.「さあ 決戦の時だ！ 皆の者 いくぞ！:
It's time for the decisive battle! All right,
everyone, let's go!

315401.「ああ もうっ！\n こんなんじゃ キリがないですっ……！: Oh, God! There's no end to this..!

315402.「わわわっ……！\n こっちに 来ないでくださーいっ！: Wah, wah, wah..! Please don't come this way!

315404.「……ったく ザコ相手に 何おびえてんだよ。\n 最強の魔法使いに なりたいんだ:
What are you scared of against a loser? You
want to be the best mage, right?

315406.「入門試験の時……俺は 最後の問いに\n どれでもないと 答えた……。:
During my introductory exam I answered the
last question with none of the above...

315407.「でも 今の答えは違う。\n 今の俺の答えは……姉さんと同じ\n 大切な人を守る:
But my answer now is different. My answer now
is... to protect someone I care about, the
same as my sister.

315408.「大切な人……？\n あっ……！ それって もしかして\n 僕たちのことですかっ:
Important person...? Ah..! Could that possibly
be us?

315409.「ごちゃごちゃ言ってる 場合かよ。\n いくぞ！:
This is no time to be messing around. Let's
go!

315412.「……そうだ。こっちへ来い！\n 数百年ぶりに 旧交を温めようじゃないか。:
...Yes. Come here! Let's renew old
acquaintances for the first time in hundreds
of years.

315415.「師匠……！\n こっちは 片付きました！: Master..! This one's all taken care of!

315417.「チ…チカラ 欲シイイィィィ……！\n モット チカラヲォォォ……！！:
I want power...I want power...! I want your
power...!

315418.「こんな状態になっても まだチカラを……。:
Even in this condition, I still have my
power...

315419.「どんなにチカラを 手に入れても\n ヤツが 満たされることはない……\n 私た:
No matter how much power he gets, he will
never be satisfied... so let's end this by our
own hands.

315425.「思った以上に……ヤツに 私のチカラを\n 持っていかれた……。ランジェ すまな:
He took more of my energy than I thought he
would... Ranje, I'm sorry... it looks like
we're done here...

315426.「何を言ってる……私を置いて 死ぬ気か！？\n おまえを失ったら 私は……\n:
What are you talking about... you're gonna die
without me! What will happen to me... the
Dragomancer... if I lose you?

315427.「過去の呪いを 断ち切った今\n ようやく 竜術士は 新たな未来に\n 進めるん:
Now that we have broken the curse of the past,
Dragomancers can finally move forward into a
new future...

315428.「この世界には おまえが必要なんだ……\n おまえを 死なせはしない！:
This world needs you...and I won't let you
die!

315430.「まさか 自分のチカラを……！: No way... I'm not going to use my power..!

315432.「ランジェ……！\n ああ……どうして こんなことを……！: Ranje..! Oh...why did you do this..!

315433.「……これで いいんだ。\n もとより おまえに もらった命……\n おまえに返:
It's all right. It's only logical that I give
you back the life you gave me.

315434.「竜術士の未来は……この時代の者たちが\n 切り拓いてくれる。<cs_pcher:
The future of Dragomancers...will be pioneered by those of this age. ...guys....take care of the
rest...

315435.「バウギス……おまえは 私に血を与えたことを\n 後悔しているようだが……それは:
Baugis... you seem to regret giving me
blood... but that is not true.

315436.「……あの時 おまえが 私を救ってくれなければ\n 私は おまえを知らないまま\:
If you hadn't saved me then, I would have died
not knowing you...

315437.「おまえなしの……人生に……\n 何の意味が あっただろう……。: What was the point of my life without you?

315438.「私たちは 世界を危機に陥れ……\n 多くの者たちを 巻き込んでしまった……。:
We have put the world at risk... and many
others...

315439.「だが……誰が なんと言おうと\n 私……は おまえに 出会え……て\n よかっ:
But... no matter what anyone says, I... am...
glad... to have met you.

315441.バウギスの悲しい叫びは いつまでも\n雪深き山々に 響き渡った……。:
Baugis' sad cries echoed through the snowy
mountains forever...

315443.「大切な人を失った時の 悲しみは\n ヒトも竜も 同じ……か。:
The grief of losing a loved one is the same
for both humans and dragons...?

315444.「ええ……。でも あなたが\n 姉を想う気持ちと バウギスの気持ちは\n 少し:
Yes... But I think your feelings for your
sister and Baugis' feelings are a little
different...

315446.「わからないんですか？\n 鈍いですねぇ……。: Don't you understand? You are so dull...

315448.「……まったく 騒々しい連中だな。\n これでは ランジェとの思い出に\n 浸る:
...What a noisy bunch. I can't even indulge in
the memories of Ranje.

315449.「<cs_pchero>……虚竜王を\n 打ち倒してくれたこと ランジェに代わっ:
<cs_pchero>...I thank you on behalf of
Ranje for defeating the false Dragonlord.
Please accept this.

315450.「……さて 私は 大空を翔けるとしよう。\n 涙は 風で拭うにかぎる……。:
Now I'm going to soar. I shall wipe my tears
with the wind...
